Attributes.description: Performance of a classification model. Generalization error, overfitting of training data. Shrinkage, feature selection, Akaike Information Criterion, Bayesian Information Criterion. k-fold cross validation. Bootstrapping. Receiver Operating Characteristic curve. Elastic nets, regularization.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 16:00, Building: Orchard, Room: Commons
